#Load libraries and data files 
```{r}
# load packages
library(ggplot2)
library(cowplot)
library(dplyr)
library(reshape2)
library(ggpubr)
library(here)

here

# load data
dat <- read.csv("../data/CBLS_watertables_waterquality_tracking.csv")
dat$Date <- as.factor(dat$Date)


```

#Temperature plot
```{r}
# plot temp
temp_wt <- ggplot(data=wt, aes(x=Date, y=Temperature_C, group=1)) +
  geom_line(colour = "gray70")+
  geom_point(size = 3, aes(color=Temperature_C)) +
  theme_bw() +
  scale_color_gradient(low = "blue", high = "red") +
  labs(title = "Water Tables Temperature (C)") +
  theme(panel.grid = element_blank(),
        axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, size = 6, vjust = 1, hjust = 1),
        legend.position = "bottom")
temp_wt

save_plot("figures/water_tables_TEMP.png", temp_wt, base_aspect_ratio = 1.8)
```


#Salinity plot
